file_content.text:
Aid the Empire by completing one of the following missions:
[GROUP] Flashpoint: Hammer Station [GROUP] Flashpoint: Athiss

Aid the Empire by completing one of the following missions:
[GROUP] Flashpoint: Mandalorian Raiders [GROUP] Flashpoint: Cademimu

Aid the Empire by completing one of the following missions:
[GROUP] Flashpoint: Boarding Party [GROUP] Flashpoint: The Foundry

Aid the Empire by completing one of the following missions:
[GROUP] Flashpoint: Colicoid War Game [GROUP] Flashpoint: The Red Reaper

Aid the Empire by completing one of the following missions:
[GROUP] Flashpoint: Directive 7 [GROUP] Flashpoint: The Battle of Ilum [GROUP] Flashpoint: The False Emperor [GROUP] Flashpoint: Kaon Under Siege [GROUP] Flashpoint: The Lost Island

Aid the Empire by completing one of the following missions in Master difficulty mode:
[MASTER] Flashpoint: The Black Talon [MASTER] Flashpoint: Boarding Party [MASTER] Flashpoint: The Foundry [MASTER] Flashpoint: Directive 7 [MASTER] Flashpoint: The Battle of Ilum [MASTER] Flashpoint: The False Emperor [MASTER] Flashpoint: Kaon Under Siege [MASTER] Flashpoint: The Lost Island
[Recommended Gear] Item Rating 126

Aid the Empire by completing three of the following missions in Hard difficulty mode:
[MASTER] Flashpoint: Hammer Station [MASTER] Flashpoint: Athiss [MASTER] Flashpoint: Mandalorian Raiders [MASTER] Flashpoint: Cademimu [MASTER] Flashpoint: Czerka Corporate Labs [MASTER] Flashpoint: Czerka Core Meltdown
[Recommended Gear] Item Rating 148

Outsiders and potential allies: A threat to Voss has emerged--both Voss and Gormak fear it: A wanderer of the Nightmare Lands, bloated with corrupt power.
The Nightmare Pilgrim seeks to corrupt all, and he is succeeding. Commandos fail to stop him. Gormak fail to stop him. Outsiders remain our final hope.
Seek the Nightmare Pilgrim. Bring him peaceful slumber. The Voss will be grateful.
Aid the Empire by defeating the vicious creature known as "The First" on Dromund Kaas and the savage beast called "Grandfather" on Balmorra.
Aid the Empire by defeating the bloodthirsty creature known as "Trapjaw" on Tatooine, the rogue battle droid R4-GL on Nar Shaddaa and the deadly Ulgo Siegebreaker droid on Alderaan.
Aid the Empire by defeating the rogue Cartel warbot on Quesh and the vicious creature known as "Snowblind" on Hoth.
Aid the Empire by defeating the massive beast known as the "Primal Destroyer" on Belsavis, the vicious "Gargath" on Hoth and the horrible "Nightmare Pilgrim" on Voss.

Congratulations on reaching level 50!
Epic adventures await you on remote worlds: Flashpoints, Operations, and more. You will need powerful equipment to face these challenges, so let's get you geared up!

This mission provides basic instructions for running [MASTER] Flashpoints using the Group Finder tool.
Reward: 5 Black Hole Commendations.
